code: @Test public void testChoice() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:camel").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello Camel").     getMockEndpoint("mock:other").expectedBodiesReceived("Hello World").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello Camel").     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").choice().when(simple("${body} contains '${properties:cool.name}'")).to("mock:camel").otherwise().to("mock:other"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").choice().when(simple("${body} contains '${properties:cool.name}'")).to("mock:camel").otherwise().to("mock:other").         }     }. }

@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     PropertiesComponent pc = new PropertiesComponent().     pc.setLocations(new String[] { "classpath:org/apache/camel/component/properties/myproperties.properties" }).     context.addComponent("properties", pc).     return context. }
